title:
Fertility Numbers of Consecutive $S_3$ Pattern-Avoiding Stack-Sorting
  maps
abstract:
In this paper, we show that for all length 3 patterns, all positive integers
are fertility numbers for the consecutive-pattern-avoiding stack-sorting map
$\textrm{SC}_\sigma$, which resolves conjecture 8.3 from Defant and Zheng. The
paper ends with a conjecture.
